pie prefab
Welcome     Gallery     Handbook


Manual page for pie_prefab(PL)

EXAMPLE

    pl  -prefab pie  values=3  labels=1  data=data9  \
      delim=tab  title="Student enrollment" 

    data9 file:
	Business Admin	1.39	331
	English 	1.67	182
	Chemistry	2.07	301
	..etc.



How to run these examples


DESCRIPTION

pie is a prefab for producing pie graphs. It is based on proc pie .


PARAMETERS

Standard prefab parameters : supported are title, delim, header, and comment, and select. No other standard parameters may be used with the pie prefab.

values is a data field holding numeric values for the pie slices. Pie slices will be displayed as proportions of the sum of all values.

labels is data field holding labels for the slices. See the proc pie labelfield attribute for more info.

colors controls slice color(s) . Default is dullyellow. If all slices are to have one color, supply one color. A comma-delimited list of colors may also be supplied. See proc pie colors attribute for more info.

explode is an amount to explode all slices, or selected slices. See proc pie explode attribute for more info.

lbldet may be used to specify text details for the labels.
